rules.name: Yes_customer_role_assigned
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)

rules.name: Yes_Score_Greater_than_MK_Threshold_MQL_Manually_Triggered
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 13) OR (2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7) AND NOT(8) AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 13) OR (8 AND 9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12 AND 13)
rules.label: Yes - Score Greater than MK Threshold/MQL Manually Triggered
